name: HH_EPSD_EVNT_HX
description: This contains audit information about the event of an episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EVENT_HX_DATE
columns.description: History of the date of the event in the episode

columns.name: DATE_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description: History of the category list selection for the event.
entries: Alternative Billing Start Date for Cutover
Notice of Admission Date for Cutover

columns.name: ENTERED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: History of the user IDs who entered the event.

columns.name: ENTERED_BY_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EVENT_COMMENT_HX
columns.description: History of the comments left about this event.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who made the edits to the event data.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which edits were made to the event data. .

columns.name: EDIT_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the event that was edited. This is the line number found in column LINE of HH_EPSD_EVNT_DATES.
